name: Chukka
languages: understands Auran and Common but speaks only through the use of its Mimicry trait

trait.name: Ambusher
text: In the first round of a combat, Chukka has advantage on attack rolls against any creature it surprised.

trait.name: Mimicry
text: Chukka can mimic any sounds it has heard, including voices. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful DC 14 Wisdom (Insight) check.

action.name: Shortsword
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

action.name: Shortbow
text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

description: Source: Baldur's Gate: Descent Into Avernus p. 83
